website_summaries.verdict: These are a comfortable and convenient pair of basic earplugs to make loud concerts more enjoyable for those sensitive to loud sounds.
pros: These earplugs offer a comfortable fit for a variety of ear shapes and sizes
Effective in blocking out unnecessary noises and minimizing volume without completely blocking out conversations and music
Comes with two sets in differing sizes and case
cons: Case is difficult to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Good At Filtering Sound, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really the best noise-filtering earplugs I've found. Very comfortable and works well in crowds where loud noise can cause PTSD related symptoms. Finally, someone has made a breathable version (no sweating around the buds) that hides well in the ear. Case makes it convenient to easily attach to a belt loop, key chain. Would recommend over the hard plastic versions.
customer_reviews.author: TruRevu

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earplugs to use at concerts. They were phenomenal! They fit in my ears perfectly flush, and didn't have any long handles sticking out that could get bumped or pulled while in a sea of a thousand people. They allowed the right amount of bass and treble through to give a great sounding performance. At the end of the night the small rubber flap allowed me to pull them out, clean them off, and stash them back in the metal carrying case. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boback

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape and exactly as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Arrived packed in a baggy with the two sizes of earplugs in their own bags. The metal container seems to be made of aluminum and is simple and small enough to be stored anywhere. Tried them on and they are soft and comfortable. I had to use the smaller ones and switching the inner red piece out wasn’t difficult. I just pinched underneath the red disc and it pulled the silicone away at the top and popped it out. Getting them into the other set was a little more difficult but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: The larger size work very well but were too big for my ears, the attenuation filter is VERY HARD to swap and the smaller ear plugs are almost too small for it to fit into. Once you have it in, the third mushroom is stretched too far to be effective. It would be nice if you just sold a smaller version with a filter designed for it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the pair to buy! Good fit, work well.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pair. They fit my ears better than the other similar earplugs I'd bought from Amazon. The noise reduction is enough to make me not want to scream due to the terrible off-key (attempt at) singing at synagogue. The attenuation seems to be reasonably flat over the whole audio range. Also, the carrying container is very good. Altogether satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but poor noise mitigation
customer_reviews.text: As a vessel inspector I am very familiar with ear plugs. These ones were just okay. Used them while trekking through tea houses in Nepal. Was hoping to cancel out the noise from the low noise insulated wall and my friends snoring with whom I was traveling with. Although they are comfortable in the ears and didn’t fall out the noise mitigation was not particularly great. If you a looking for something truly noise cancelling you are better off with something that goes over the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Nowakowski

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably, and dampens noise levels
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs work well to dampen loud noises. The set comes with a large and small pair, and one set of red discs that cause the actual noise reduction. The material fits comfortably and stays in my ear without irritation. My only dislike is that the earplugs don't come with a string attached, do I wonder how long it will be until I lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This have been my savior. I am a cub scout leader and when there is a room full of 60 kids, I can put these in and still be able to have conversations with other parents, but the screaming kid noise is drowned out dramatically. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low profile, uniform sound cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Nothing will compare to custom-built plugs, but these do a good job dampening the sound across all pitches. The package came with three different sized plugs that you can pretty easily change out. My favorite thing about these is how low profile they are. My last set of earplugs had little handles that kind of stuck out of your ears, but these lay pretty flat into my ear with a tab that still makes them easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Sorena D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, compare to Eargasm earplugs but less $
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I haven't used them at a concert yet, but did try them with the music playing loud, and other ambient noise around. They seem to make the music less loud, without a total loss of fidelity. I still hear highs and lows, but the volume is less loud. Exactly what I wanted for this year's concerts!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Hall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: The music at church is too loud, causing me earache and headaches, so I got these and have been so happy with them. They reduce the uncomfortable volume, but allow me to still enjoy the music. I haven’t had any earache or headache since wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McKibbin

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I got the first chance to try these at Austin City Limits festival and one of them went bad right away. I put them in my ears per the instructions but one of the earplugs sounds like a blown speaker, for lack of a better example. This may just be a problem with these kinds of earplugs because they use a small disk - like a speaker cone - to dampen the sound without distortion. I guess that just means it can be blown out like a speaker. Bit saddened since these cost 15x what a pair of foam earplugs do.
customer_reviews.author: jek

customer_reviews.title: Save your ears
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had these a long time ago. I tried them in my car with the music blasting. You can hear everything without the earache and deafness. I haven't had them on to long but they are so comfy you can probably have them on for awhile. They are aesthetically appealing. Get some. You don't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shop till u drop

customer_reviews.title: Fillets only background noises.  Not for small ears though.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these fir me, but they were too big for my ears. My husband works in a shipping department and hates all the noise. He says they help A LOT in filtering the background noise. He can still hear the intercom paging and people talking directly to him, which is not possible with traditional ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: BBV

customer_reviews.title: Affordable safety, comfort and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality compared to foam plugs. Smaller silicone option kept these in place without causing discomfort. The carrying case kept them easily accessible so I didn’t forget to use them while hopping around venues. Would recommend to a friend and/or buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: thelauren.shop

customer_reviews.title: Go to raves often ? I recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for several concerts , Raves and even clubs . Used them all 3 days at EDC Las Vegas and saved my hearing while still feeling the bass and listening to the music. Much better than regular ear plugs .
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: These do not provide any significant benefit to me. The noise reduction is barely noticeable, a pair of cheap foam earplugs do a better job. For really effective protection I believe that you need to simply go with full muffs or headset. Seems products like this are gimmicky. Don't understand the positive reviews at all. False sense of them working or just plain false reviews? Sorry, a big no here. They are being sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Can't wear them for very long, the inserts cause ear canal pain
customer_reviews.text: These fit me well, but the insert that restricts the airflow causes pain after wearing them for any lengthy amount of time. They do a mediocre job of blocking sound as well, however I'm using them while sleeping and from my understand are meant to cut louder sounds. The quieter sounds during the night are not effected.
customer_reviews.author: James Pero

customer_reviews.title: comfort and size
customer_reviews.text: I am concerned about plugs falling off unknowingly and losing my money. They should be redesigned to come with chord that you can put around your neck in case they become loose and fall.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but work
customer_reviews.text: They work. Service was good. But they hurt to wear and don’t stay in well unless you get them in really snug. And then they are really uncomfortable. I wasn’t able to wear them through an entire concert.
customer_reviews.author: Kassy Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good fit,  less visible than others
customer_reviews.text: Acoustic filters are the way to go but have not found one that i can sing vocals while playing an instrument in a band setting. These seem like a high amount of reduction but an in home test seems might not be as much as advertised. Will adjust score and update after a few practices and comparison to some others i purchased at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not include 2 pairs, rather 1 pair with interchangeable covers
customer_reviews.text: The description of the item made it seem like there were going to be 2 pairs of earbuds included but there is really only one pair with replaceable covers. Upset that 2 pairs were not included.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Y

customer_reviews.title: Nice earplugs for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: Great earplugs for use at concerts or other loud areas. Very comfortable, and they sound much better than if you use basic rubber earplugs. Your ears are important so protect them with these!
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, you can't get them out of your ears
customer_reviews.text: The little plastic tabs are hard to locate when they are in your ear. If you need to remove them fast it could be a big problem. WASTE OF GOOD MONEY AND THERE IS NO ONE FOR ME TO CONTACT ABOUT IT. ONLY SELLER FEEDBACK IS AN OPTION BUT THAT OPTION HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH MY CONCERN
customer_reviews.author: Kika

customer_reviews.title: Great for music festivals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Bonnaroo, I was planning to get up front for a lot of shows and wanted to keep my ears safe. They didn't muffle the sound, and were particularly helpful at the EDM shows when the bass is blasting in your face. Definitely worth the price to protect your hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love that it connects to your key ring for convenience
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and very durable case. Love that it connects to your key ring for convenience. Earplugs are comfortable and improve the sound at concerts while protecting your ears. I would recommend for others and have told friends about them.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good for concerts cuts out distortion
customer_reviews.text: great product for concerts or festivals for sound of music but for like motorcycle riding it is not good. Seems like the diaphragm kind of rattles in it makes my ears ring pretty bad
customer_reviews.author: Zane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Save your hearing while enjoying the show.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife after my daughter gifted me a pair. Attenuates a bit more of the high frequencies than I would like. Still, helps me to enjoy shows when the guys on the mixing board believe max volume is the only way.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Davis

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to use and wear
customer_reviews.text: Handy item to keep on key chain, works great as a second ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I was recently diagnosed with an inner ear issue that causes vertigo and I was told I needed to protect my ear from loud noise. I have used these at work, concerts and an airshow and they worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Size is a little small
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs allow you to hear clearer than normal earplugs and still have high fidelity at a lower volume.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I could not tell any difference with them in or out other than they were not comfortable. I should have paid a little more for the Eargasms.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality plugs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Good quality plugs and the carrying case is very convenient. Bought these for my fiance who's a musician and also runs sound for large bands. He appreciates the ear protection while also still being able to hear the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Great sound filtration!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of earplugs and these have great, clear sound filtration for concerts. However, they're a little wide, even with the narrow inserts, so they may not be best for people with narrow/small ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Listening
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Kenny Wayne Shepherd concert and they allowed me to hear the music clearly at a safe level. So happy for these.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Product not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I did not find that these earplugs worked very well. I wore these to a rock concert and while they did diminish the decibels, it was very minimal. They never quite fit right and I was constantly readjusting their fit, which was the case for both sets of rubber plugs they came with. I have used similar, more expensive bands in the past and I’d rather spend the extra money and go back to those.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pair that works!
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs fit in my ears snug and the material is soft. They do a great job of blocking loud noises and allow me to still hear some. The low profile is great too. This is my 3rd kind to try and finally have some that work.
customer_reviews.author: Pam T.

customer_reviews.title: Best plugs for a concert or jamming!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had these plugs 15-20 years ago. I've been to many, many shows & band practices with earplugs that "deadened" the noise level, but kill the quality. I've worn these to 2 concerts & 2 practices and the difference is amazing!! Everything sounds like it's coming off the soundboard. Game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Markmlaw

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: im a professional DJ and i prefer these ear plugs to my custom $400 in ear molds. u cant go wrong with this item! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lymyt

customer_reviews.title: Poor ear fit and negligible sound dampening
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to get a good fit in my ear and when I finally did sound wasn't blocked anymore than sticking anything in your ears would do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit snugly but comfortably. Haven't gotten the chance to test them at ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with two different sizes and a carrying case. They fit snugly but comfortably. Haven't gotten the chance to test them at a live event but I tested them at home and the sound clarity is still very crisp. Can't wait to try these bad boys out at a concert!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Quality ear Protection
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine has similar earplugs that were more expensive. These perform just the same. Very helpful to receive two sizes. Brief instructions on how to change out the attenuation filter would've been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: David Curry

customer_reviews.title: A must for motorcycle riders.
customer_reviews.text: Audiomate earplugs are phenomenal. I wear them while I'm riding my motorcycle, and they reduce the wind, and road noise yet allow me to, clearly, hear my music. Great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kehrwald

customer_reviews.title: Much better than cheap er plugs
customer_reviews.text: I use them for noise reduction while Motorcycle riding..do the job.
customer_reviews.author: REP

customer_reviews.title: Great performance, sits right on
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, sits right on. Decreases noise excelently, performs better than expected... very fast shippment. I'd recomend these ear plugs for others (i'm a proffesional wedding photographer).
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Great noise reduction and mobility. I use these for drumline and can safely say they do their job extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: i don't recommend this stuff
customer_reviews.text: they don't work at all. i hear all ambient sounds. and they are very inconvenient in ears. i don't recommend them at all. Macks are much better
customer_reviews.author: Fyodor

customer_reviews.title: Must have for music festival goers!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at every festival I've taken them to! The case definitely helps with not loosing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus B

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great earplugs just as described. Will be ordering more. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Dampens noise with muffling sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Dampened noise without a lot of muffling. Sturdy carrying container keychain
customer_reviews.author: Angela Scifres

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it says. Just have to keep it moist to feel maximum comfort. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I wore these at EDC Las Vegas, and they did a good job of helping to save my hearing, while being able to enjoy the festival.
customer_reviews.author: Michael William Ferras

customer_reviews.title: These worked perfect for an outdoor music festival
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for an outdoor music festival. Could still enjoy the music, but my ears were ringing after 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: R. Flemming

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to keep in ears. If by some chance they do stay in, they do not cancel out the noise.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Audiomate earplugs today and tested them out by playing some loud music on my speaker. Having sensitive ears I was very impressed with how well these earplugs work. I am super excited to test them out at the concert I am going to soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cayden Lane17

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Considering what I paid for these earplugs, they're worth the price. So far they've worked well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great plugs, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great ear plugs. I love how you can hear the whole concert, but ears don’t ring
customer_reviews.author: Brett Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my motorcycle every time I ride and I love them. Keeps me from yelling when I get off cuz my motorcycle is too loud
customer_reviews.author: Evan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you love shows.
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and they worked wonderfully for a metal concert.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: On the small side..
customer_reviews.text: I found out I have a phobia.. getting stuff stuck in my ears. They are so small, I had to literally pry them out with a standard screwdriver. The other set was the same exact size, so no idea what that's there for. 3 stars because while they were in there, I could hear well enough to not completely freak out. Wish they were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Probably saved my hearing.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Using regular foam earplugs at band practice ruined the frequency response. These performed great. they cut the volume down without destroying frequency response. I will recommend these to other musician friends. I can't wait to try these out at a live concert. Addendum. Tried to get the rebate and the request came back as an untrusted site. Hmm. Had to downgrade my review a star. Maybe something???
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nygaard

customer_reviews.title: The smaller size of the two in the pack fit her best. They work really well in bringing the noise ...
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my Sensory teen. The smaller size of the two in the pack fit her best. They work really well in bringing the noise level down yet allowing her to still hear what is going on. They are comfortable and easy to put in and out. The case is metal and works great for storing the earplugs in. It's great too that the smaller ones are completely clear as it makes them more hidden than wearing the red ones. Her peers don't notice when they are in.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for smaller ears
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is a drummer because he was reusing the same disposable ones repeatedly (EWWWWW). He loves the fit of the smaller version and we love the fact that we can clean them! He says they are much more comfortable and do a better job than the disposables.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pastrick

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: I wore these 8 hours a day in a factory for 3 days, then I noticed the horrible cuts in my ears. The function is awesome. They do filter noise which I was pleasantly surprised by, but they really fall down into the ear hole. It was the plastic filter insert that started cutting my ears. Maybe due to taking them in and out for breaks and such. But I found cuts in the ears in a dirty factory environment is bad news. They got infected and the next week really sucked having to cram the old school foam buds into gashed ears.
customer_reviews.author: allelsetaken

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and still clear.
customer_reviews.text: I have issues using simple foam in the ear plugs. I have used over the ear 'muff' but both styles muffle too much of the sound available. So fa these earplugs do exactly what they advertise. They knock down the intensity of loud sounds but still let you hear voices, phone conversations, etc... I like the fact that they breathe as well. So far, I have been using them for over a week with no issues. I dunk them in isopropyl alcohol between uses to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Does What it Says!
customer_reviews.text: These fit really nice. I wear them at work (office job) where I don't want to be distracted by background noise, but need to hear when someone comes to my desk to talk to me. I was surprised how well I could hear people speaking directly to me. Paired with noise cancelling over-ear headphones for air travel...pure silence.
customer_reviews.author: jjerno

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, effective, cheap, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, comfortable, and effective, they also sit flush with your ear and work well with motorcycle helmets with bluetooth coms systems, Update: ordered a second set as i lost my first, still happy with these and i found they stay put without hurting like the compressable foam or silicone "military style" plugs that tend to start digging into you after a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: T3K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice noise REDUCING ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: These are interesting ear plugs. They reduce the amount of noise but do not cancel it. It's very helpful if you don't want to completely block out noise. It made the lunch room a lot more comfortable🤣. I could still carry on conversations with people in my immediate vicinity.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Ryan

customer_reviews.title: These things Rock!! Helps to feel the music more (Bass)
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! They do a good job of keeping most frequencies, but turning them down. Making the bass thumping your body stand out. You "feel" the music. I Prevail, Bearfoot, and A day to remember concert. So it was pretty hard, loud music. The only downfall is that it seems to take a while to get them adjusted comfortably, cause they seem to have to go pretty deep.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Harris

customer_reviews.title: These work great! Really blunt the loud sounds while still allowing ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Really blunt the loud sounds while still allowing you to hold a conversation and hear someone talking to you. Comes with two sizes - if one is the wrong size for you, the other should fit. Also shipped quickly, which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried the most expensive brands, but these earplugs are great. They seem to be very comfortable (I still haven’t tried them on for a long period of time though) and effective. I use them for motorcycle riding, and for flights.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I dont give 5 stars on noise cancelling is due to my own ears. My left ear canal seems to be shorter than my right, so these and any plugs touch way too far in and thus continue to transmit noise(yes at a lower level) (trust me I've tried several different plugs from different makers) So this is completely my anatomy and not a product issue. My right ear is happier than a pig in its pen though. So yea. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Reduces discomfort for frequency sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to foam ear plugs. I'm a musician and recently discovered I have hearing damage and sensitivity to high frequencies. These earplugs reduce the sound entering my ears, reducing discomfort but allowing me to hear everything essential. Think of it as a low flow water faucet for sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price.
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from my five year old Hear-o’s. Fit very snug, and have solid sound quality while taking out the painful highs. I’m a gigging drummer and need ear protection that’s comfortable and capable - these are them! Also love the aluminum case.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: amazing excess decibel reduction
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earplugs I've used. Very comfortable and they filter well.
customer_reviews.author: See Me PURE

customer_reviews.title: Are exactly what I wanted to help reduce the sound in the gym classes. I am also planning to use them on my next airplane trip.
customer_reviews.text: These Are exactly what I wanted to help reduce the sound in the gym classes. I am also planning to use them on my next airplane trip. I appreciate that they are small and also that they have a little case that can be hooked to your keychain so it is not lost.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jo Finer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping these would be great.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these were a big waste of money. They really are horrible. I just used them on a flight to/from LA and it was essentially like I had nothing in my ear to block out the noise. I had to guys across the aisle from me having a conversation the entire flight and I could hear every word. Pretty clear sign to me that these don't work. I would be better off with the bright orange squishy plugs I get from HomeDepot.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: hear clearly at a lower volume
customer_reviews.text: Love these, keep them with me at all times. Purchased for singing, use them for anything loud.
customer_reviews.author: David Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my kid who practice drum. Fit well and protect his hearing while session/practice.
customer_reviews.author: K ty

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, they work as described and the case fits in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Regular foam ear plugs are better regarding noise reduction. Hurting my ears after 5 hours of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: amisu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works like the more expensive ones exactly the same way!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs get the job done very well. I can hear well, but at the same time my ears are protected. They fit nicely and aren't really noticeable from outside. The case is also nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron T

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they claim to have 27 Db of protection. I have a pair of 15 DB plugs and my audiologist told me that is the minimum I should wear. I thought these might be better. I rode my motorcylce for 200 miles and after the ride my ears were ringing the rest of the day, into the night and the next day also. Not good. Disappointing in that if my ears were left ringing, then damage was being done. I have gone back to my old plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Not good in a Data Center
customer_reviews.text: These do nothing to block the sounds of an enterprise level in-room air conditioning unit or in-line battery generators. The attenuation filter is VERY HARD to swap from the big size to the smaller size earbud.
customer_reviews.author: HiRub

product_meta.title: Audiomate High-Fidelity Earplugs with Metal Keychain Carry Case and 2 Interchangeable Earbuds Comfortable Soft Silicone HiFi Noise Attenuating Ear Plugs for Musicians, Concert, Sleeping & More
feature_bullets: NOISE REDUCTION MEETS SOUND FIDELITY: Lower damaging decibel levels without lowering sound quality. Unlike regular noise reduction earplugs that have a noise reduction rating of just 16db or foam earplugs that muffle sound, Audiomate earplugs lead the pack with a true NRR of 27db and high-fidelity attenuating filters. This means you get to effectively protect your hearing without missing out on the acoustic experience.

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: We believe rocking sound attenuating earplugs shouldn’t be a pain. THOUGHTFULNESS IN DESIGN: With a low profile and transparent earbuds, Audiomate HiFi earplugs keep things sleek and discreet. We’ve also fitted them with understated pull tabs for fumble-free adjustments and unique ventilation channels that ensure proper airflow to keep your ears healthy.
